title: An integrated circuit sometimes called&nbsp
An integrated circuit (IC),is a semiconductor wafer on which thousands or millions of tiny resistors, inductors, and transistors are fabricated.
An integrated circuit (IC), sometimes called a chip or microchip, is a semiconductor wafer on which thousands or millions of tiny resistors,capacitors,and transistors are fabricated.
Advantages of ICs over discrete components (PCB design)
One of the advantages of Ics over discrete components is low reliability
High reliability means
answer_1: low probability of failure and long lifetime
answer_2: high probability of failure and long lifetime
answer_3: low probability of failure and short lifetime
answer_4: high probability of failure and short lifetime
right_answer: low probability of failure and long lifetime

A monolithic IC is a miniaturized electronic circuit including active components and their interconnections are being manufactured in the surface of a thin substrate of semiconductor material.
Film IC can only be used as passive circuit components
Film components are made of either capacitive or noncapacitive material that is deposited in desired pattern on a ceramic or glass substrate.
Hybrid IC technology is the combination of mixed circuits and film technology.

The fabrication sequence consists of a series of steps in which layers of the chip are defined through a process called masks
Photolithography is a process of transferring patterns of geometric shape on a mask onto a conductive material called photoresist, covering the entire silicon wafer surface.
Smaller transistors are faster because electrons have to travel as far to get from the source to the drain.
Smaller transistors consume high energy because fewer electrons are needed to charge up the gates.
The inverter could be defined by a hypothetical set of six masks in the following order
answer_1: n-well&nbsp; - polysilicon - n+diffusion - p+diffusion - contacts - metal
answer_2: n-well&nbsp; - polysilicon - n+diffusion - p+diffusion - metal- contacts
answer_3: n-well&nbsp; - polysilicon - p+diffusion - n+diffusion - contacts - metal
right_answer: n-well&nbsp; - polysilicon - p+diffusion - n+diffusion - contacts - metal

title: The photoresist is stripped away from the surface of the wafer using
answer_1: a mixture of acids called piranha etch
right_answer: a mixture of acids called piranha etch

title: The two ways to add dopants to the wafer are
In the ion implantation process, the wafer is placed in a furnace with a gas containing the dopants. When heated, dopant atoms diffuse into the substrate.
In diffusion, dopant ions are accelerated through an electric field and blasted into the substrate.
